item.title: Report E-2025040571
item.description:
Report E-2025040571

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-01T01:13:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-24
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On April 24, 2025, two (2) 1-pound boxes of sodium hydroxide were damaged and released approximately one (1) cup of product to the cardboard boxes. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Environmental Restoration (ER) to remediate the site. The crew utilized hand tools and absorbents to collect the released product. The impacted materials were containerized in one (1) 5-gallon pail.
